changePlans.question: Can I change plans anytime?
changePlans.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

eventLimit.question: What happens if I exceed my event limit?
eventLimit.answer: You'll receive a notification when approaching your limit. We'll work with you to find the right solution.

freeTrial.question: Is there a free trial?
freeTrial.answer: The Free plan is always available with no time limit. Start using it right away!

cancelAnytime.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancelAnytime.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time with no penalties or hidden fees.
